mapper.select: select count(*) from class c join course co on c.class_no = co.class_no join student s on s.student_no = co.student_no where c.class_no = #{classNo} and course_status = 'Y'
select class_name , class_no from class where class_no = #{classNo}

select s.student_id , c.class_name , c.class_semester , EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM s.ENROLL_DATE) + 1 AS student_hak , prof_no , s.student_name , c.class_no , s.student_no from class c join course co on c.class_no = co.class_no join student s on s.student_no = co.student_no where c.class_no = #{classNo} and course_status = 'Y'

select distinct * from (select class_num , class_name , class_typename , class_score , term_no , mid_point , fin_point , project_point , atten_point , total_point , grade , course_year from grade g right join class c on g.class_no = c.class_no left join course co on c.class_no = co.class_no left join class_type ct on c.class_type = ct.class_type where g.student_no = #{stuNo} and course_year = 2024 and course_semester = 1)

select distinct * from (select class_num , class_name , class_typename , class_score , term_no , mid_point , fin_point , project_point , atten_point , total_point , grade , course_year from grade g right join class c on g.class_no = c.class_no left join course co on c.class_no = co.class_no left join class_type ct on c.class_type = ct.class_type where g.student_no = #{stuNo} and course_year = #{year} and course_semester = #{term})
